rules_text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Toadstool Kingdom: Creatures you control gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. [i](This permanent can't be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color until end of turn.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Against all odds, the gnomes and the toads coexist peacefully among the oversized fungi.[/i]
